name: Imminent (t90team)
description:
Imminent

Our third attempt at Ludum Dare! This time we have created a game based on ongoing real life events. So if anyone is taking modern military conflicts too close to heart, consider this as trigger warning.

You are playing as Alya, fresh from Academy Lieutenant commanding Fox-10 squad. Alongside your squadmates young volunteer Neka and battle hardened veteran Suzu you are manning an anti-aircraft vehicle named “The Carapace”. Look at the radar, pick approaching air targets and try to intercept them to save the day for your allies and civilians alike.

Controls

Control the cone of fire with A/D or arrow keys.

Use left click to select targets on the radar.

Press yellow button to reload the tubes, red button to fire rockets!
